content: Hello everyone, I am a new contributor to this project, having just submitted my first pull request (https://github.com/teorth/equational_theories/pull/335) which is a minor fix for a missing word in the tex source for the intro chapter of the blueprint. After submitting the PR, I received a message that the CI workflow requires approval from a maintainer in order to run. Apologies in advance if this violates the etiquette of this project, but I am posting this message here to request a maintainer to approve the CI workflow run on my pull request. Thank you and please let me know if I should be doing something differently in order to contribute!
Welcome, Avi! I am going to approve it in a moment.
Pietro Monticone has marked this topic as resolved.
